ComicInfo.Summary:
Haywire: Sparks fly as Deadlock returns to base in his evil persona and goes head to head against Cabbot! Plus, Bloodstrike is assigned to investigate the return of Supreme. Unfortunately, Supreme proves too powerful and rips the members of the team to pieces.
A Tale of The Knight - Chapter 4: Investigating an unusual flux of energy, The Knight are ambushed by the Acurans. After the battle with the Acurans, The Knights supposedly dead founder Davros shows up.
ComicInfo.Title: Haywire; A Tale of The Knight - Chapter 4
ComicInfo.Writer: Eric Stephenson,Rob Liefeld,Keith Giffen,Kurt Hathaway,Keith Giffen,Eric Stephenson,Rob Liefeld,Kurt Hathaway
